list_definition.definition: to remove (an organ of the body) and put it into another person or animal

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Doctors are able to transplant kidneys.

list_definition.definition: to remove (skin) and put it on another part of the body.

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: We transplanted the rose bush (to the back garden).

list_definition.definition: an operation in which an organ or skin is transplanted

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He had to have a kidney transplant.

list_definition.definition: an organ, skin, or a plant that is transplanted

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The transplant was rejected by the surrounding tissue.
